all_fixes.explanation: Annotated flash-loan-sensitive price calculation with an AUDIT comment; manual review and redesign recommended.
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
-         // Solving this gives k = round(x / log(2)) and x' = x - k * log(2).
+ // AUDIT: Price calculation marked flash-loan-sensitive; consider TWAP/oracle guards, liquidity checks, or caps.
+         // Solving this gives k = round(x / log(2)) and x' = x - k * log(2).

all_fixes.explanation: Annotated flash-loan-sensitive price calculation with an AUDIT comment; manual review and redesign recommended.
Annotated flash-loan-sensitive price calculation with an AUDIT comment; manual review and redesign recommended.
